'''3.21.5''' is an update to the [[Minecraft Launcher]] that was released on October 17, 2025.

== Additions ==
* Added launcher controller support for controllers and the [https://www.xbox.com/en-US/handhelds/rog-xbox-ally ROG Xbox Ally].

== Fixes ==
* {{bug|MCL-25778}} - Chromebook is misspelled as “Chrombook” on the “Buy Minecoins” page on the bottom of the page
* {{bug|MCL-25777}} - Minecoins miscapitalized in one string ("Buy MineCoins")
* Various other bug fixes & under the hood improvements.
